faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Recruiting Cloud Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Recruiting Cloud Training covers key modules including Core HR, Security, Recruiting, Candidate Management, Career Sites, Candidate Selection, Interview Management, Job Requisitions, Third-Party Integrations, and Onboarding Administration. For a complete syllabus, please refer to our detailed course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Training sessions are held from Monday to Saturday, with 1-hour live sessions per day. This schedule ensures consistent learning and time for hands-on practice.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, we do not offer weekend-only batches. All sessions are scheduled from Monday to Saturday for better continuity.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, recorded sessions are available for self-paced learners. However, live doubt clarification is not included in the self-paced model.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes! Internship opportunities are offered based on your performance in mock evaluations, giving you practical exposure to real-world Oracle Recruiting Cloud projects.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Recruiting Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No, the Oracle Recruiting Cloud Training is offered as a complete course package. We do not offer individual module enrollment.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer end-to-end resume building assistance tailored to Oracle Recruiting Cloud job roles, showcasing your project experience and relevant skills.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, having a laptop or desktop is essential for accessing the Oracle Cloud instance and practicing hands-on tasks.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior technical background is needed. The course starts from the basics, although familiarity with HR or recruitment processes is a plus. Suitable for B.Tech, PG, and graduates from all fields.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We start with foundational concepts and build up to advanced topics in Oracle Recruiting Cloud, making it ideal for both freshers and experienced professionals.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer placement support, including mock interviews, resume preparation, and career guidance. We collaborate with top companies like Evosys, Tech Mahindra, NTT Data, Hitachi Vantara, and others.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle Recruiting Cloud Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide certification guidance, including sample questions, preparation tips, and mentorship to help you achieve Oracle certification.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes, all session recordings are available for 1 year, along with soft-copy study materials that include step-by-step guides and screenshots

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide module-wise interview questions and conduct mock interviews to prepare you for real-time job scenarios.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes, you will receive 3 months of Oracle Cloud instance access for practical training. No installation is required — everything is cloud-based.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes! With your 1-year membership, you can attend multiple batches at no extra cost.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes, on successful completion of the training, you will receive an official Course Completion Certificate in Oracle Recruiting Cloud.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: No coding skills are required. The course focuses on functional and technical aspects of Oracle Recruiting Cloud without heavy programming.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, personalized one-on-one training is available upon request. Pricing will differ from group batches.
